ISSUE.TITLE: Feature request : add support for JDBC
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The most of the times a person working in system integrations needs more database connection. It would be amazing having a bridge like jdbc drivers to autogenenerate a rest or graphql, as is doing Cloudbeaver.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #179 from nocodb/fix/link-bugs Link bug fixes, improved cache key scheme and header tiptap nodes have placeholder when empty

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #180 from nocodb/fix/embed-bugs Fixed issue with embed
